title: Living On The Edge With Chip Ingram - 16 Sermons
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------
LIVING ON THE EDGE WITH CHIP INGRAM - 16 SERMONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

Living On The Edge, a discipleship ministry and radio/television program of pastor and author Chip Ingram, is committed to providing everyday believers with tools that help them live like Christians. Each week, Chip will take you through God's Word for insight on topics like strengthening your marriage, understanding love and sex, raising children, and overcoming painful emotions. Today, a daily listening audience of more than one million people can hear Living on the Edge on over 800 outlets across the United States and internationally.

Today's torrent contains 16 bible inspired sermons preached during the 2013 calendar year.  Each sermon is about 30 or so minutes long.  Details of all 16 topics include...

 * 2013 - Is Your God Too Small - Part 1
 * 2013 - Is Your God Too Small - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Faithfulness Of God - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Faithfulness Of God - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Goodness Of God - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Goodness Of God - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Holliness Of God - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Holliness Of God - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Justice Of God - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Justice Of God - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Love Of God - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Love Of God - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Sovereignty Of God - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Sovereignty Of God - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Wisdom Of God - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Wisdom Of God - Part 2

And while you're at it, if you haven't already, be sure to check out some of my other Sermon Packages found here on The Pirate Bay.  To date there are 17 packages to choose from (accounting for 747 sermons in total) including...

 * A New Beginning With Greg Laurie - 40 Sermons
 * A Quick Word With Beth Moore - 59 Sermons
 * Back To The Bible With Woodrow Kroll - 60 Sermons
 * Daily Hope With Pastor Rick Warren - 45 Sermons
 * FamilyLife Today With Dennis Rainey - 60 Sermons
 * From His Heart With Jeff Schreve - 25 Sermons
 * Grace Church With Pastor Troy Dobbs - 60 Sermons
 * Grace To You With John MacArthur - 23 Sermons
 * Insight For Living With Chuch Swindoll - 22 Sermons
 * Lighten Up With Ken Davis - 35 Sermons
 * Living On The Edge With Chip Ingram - 16 Sermons
 * My Family Talk With Dr James Dobson - 22 Sermons
 * PowerPoint With Jack Graham - 30 Sermons
 * Precepts For Life With Kay Arthur - 75 Sermons
 * Unlocking The Bible With Colin Smith - 30 Sermons
 * UpWords With Max Lucado - 83 Sermons
 * Walk In The Word With Dr James MacDonald - 62 Sermons

For His Glory,
TorrentTracts - September 2013
